pages.title: So what are there?
pages.text: $(br2)$(br2)This section will walk you through on how to get your hands on basic resources.

pages.title: Meteorite Pieces
pages.text: Meteorite pieces can be obtained by mining meteorites(ores) found in comets and meteors fallen on the world(see next page). They come in crude, regular and rich versions. $(br2)They can be used to craft items related to the star, the street of the stellar, the $(l)Hoshimachi$().

pages.title: The Stellarite
pages.text: The $(#50e5f9)Stellarite$() is a rare material, combining the power of the stars.
Copper rods are used to make different tools and weapons. They are crafted using normal copper.
